content: "Che facevi ieri sera alle 8:00?" "Cenavo con la mia famiglia, ma mentre noi mangiavamo mio fratello navigava su Internet."
translations: eng:What were you doing yesterday evening at 8 o'clockï¹– I was having dinner with my family, but while we were eating, my bro
